metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6052 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The HandleRFBServerMessage function in libvncclient/rfbproto.c in LibVNCServer 0.9.9 and earlier does not check certain malloc return values, which allows remote VNC servers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code by specifying a large screen size in a (1) FramebufferUpdate, (2) ResizeFrameBuffer, or (3) PalmVNCReSizeFrameBuffer message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-6052` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

italc-client - 1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1
italc-management-console - 1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1
italc-master - 1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1
libitalccore - 1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same patches as CVE-2014-6051 krfb is only a server, this issue is client side.

criterions.comment: italc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1').
